sentences.en: In the meantime, the amount of CO2 in the air is rapidly approaching the limits proposed by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
sentences.cn: 与此同时，空气中的二氧化碳含量正迅速接近政府间气候变化专门委员会（IPCC）提出的上限。

sentences.en: Hopefully we intergovernmental concerns, is no longer coming National day holiday period.
sentences.cn: 但愿我们间的关切，不再是国庆佳节来临的时刻。

sentences.en: Intergovernmental Agreement of the International space Station established the legal framework for ISS, the largest space cooperation in the human history.
sentences.cn: 《国际空间站合作协议》为国际空间站这一迄今为止规模最大的空间合作项目确立了法律框架。
